MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH39 postcode area of North Berwick. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut and are working to get supplies restored. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to repair the fault on our underground cable network and we now expect your supply to be restored by 5pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:27pm on Monday, 29 March 2021.
